author: rekovic
body:
PR 10_3_X
This is a revert of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23876, which reverted https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23759.  

Compared to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23759, this PR keeps depricated CondFormats for backward compatibility.
(Endcap ... notice lower case "cap")
title: Fix switch EMTF O2O Endcap to EndCap
